document_data.name: Ostorian resin
document_data.mainbody: '''Ostorian resin''' was a variety of mysterious, ancient resin found in small batches in only the most well preserved of [[Ostoria]]n ruins.
document_data.History: All artisans and naturalists who studied this resin in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]] to identify the material.
document_data.Usages: Those who found this resin in the [[Present Age]] were known to use it in the restoration of Ostorian relics.
